edu.rit.image.png

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.image.png.Chunk
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    acTLChunk, fcTLChunk, fdATChunk, IDATChunk, IENDChunk, IHDRChunk, pHYsChunk, PLTEChunk

    public abstract class Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable
    Class Chunk is the abstract base class for a chunk stored in a PNG file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chunk()
      Construct a new uninitialized chunk.
      Chunk(int typeCode, byte[] data)
      Construct a new chunk with data taken from the given array.
      Chunk(int typeCode, byte[] data, int off, int len)
      Construct a new chunk with data taken from a portion of the given array.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void read(java.io.DataInput in)
      Read this chunk from the given data input stream.
      void readExternal(java.io.ObjectInput in)
      Read this chunk from the given object input stream.
      void write(java.io.DataOutput out)
      Write this chunk to the given data output stream.
      void writeExternal(java.io.ObjectOutput out)
      Write this chunk to the given object output stream.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chunk

        public Chunk()
        Construct a new uninitialized chunk. This constructor is for use only by object deserialization.

      • Chunk

        public Chunk(int typeCode,
     byte[] data)
        Construct a new chunk with data taken from the given array.
        Parameters:
        typeCode - Chunk type code.
        data - Array of chunk data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.

      • Chunk

        public Chunk(int typeCode,
     byte[] data,
     int off,
     int len)
        Construct a new chunk with data taken from a portion of the given array.
        Parameters:
        typeCode - Chunk type code.
        data - Array of chunk data.
        off - Index of first byte of chunk data.
        len - Number of bytes of chunk data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if data is null.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if off < 0, len < 0, or off+len > data.length.
